description: Displays detailed metrics of a single node in the server.

panels.description: The average percentage of non-idle time for all CPU cores in the last 15s
panels.title: Utilization

panels.description: The proportion of idle time and non-idle time
panels.title: Idle v. Busy

panels.description: Proportion of each item in non-idle time
panels.title: Busy

panels.description: The number of times the CPU handles hardware or software interrupts
panels.title: Number of Interrupts

panels.description: The increment of the number of context switches in one minute and converts it to an average per second
panels.title: Context Switch

panels.description: Average load metrics for the past 1, 5, and 15 minutes are provided
panels.title: Average CPU load

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: System load(5m avg)

title: machine-more-cpu
